nodes.excerpt: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
nodes.title: Carta SAFE Calculator - Calculate your future dilution in just a few clicks
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 早期阶段的筹款是很难的。了解任何长期的影响，使其更容易。⠀ 介绍Carta SAFE计算器。⠀ 只需点击几下，您就可以。-计算您的未来稀释 -比较资金前与资金后SAFEs的影响。
localize.tagline: 只需点击几下，就能计算出您未来的稀释率。

localize.description: 早期階段的籌款是很難的。瞭解任何長期的影響，使其更容易。⠀ 介紹Carta SAFE計算器。⠀ 只需點擊幾下，您就可以。-計算您的未來稀釋 -比較資金前與資金後SAFEs的影響。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊幾下，就能計算出您未來的稀釋率。

nodes.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US were down 9% over the past week, the 61st consecutive day of week-over-week declines. Down 73% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 过去一周美国科维德-19住院人数下降9%，这是连续61天周环比下降。较1月6日的峰值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt。
過去一週美國科維德-19住院人數下降9%，這是連續61天周環比下降。較1月6日的峯值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt。

nodes.title:
It took Google 8 years to hit $10 billion in sales, the fastest ever for a U.S. startup. 

5 EV companies think they're going to do it faster. 

I'll take the way over on this one. 

https://t.co/9Ji7OF1VRh https://t.co/nBMHU6xCPK
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
谷歌花了8年时间才达到100亿美元的销售额，是美国创业公司有史以来最快的。

5家电动车公司认为他们会做得更快。

这一点上，我倒是很赞同。

https://t.co/9Ji7OF1VRh https://t.co/nBMHU6xCPK

谷歌花了8年時間才達到100億美元的銷售額，是美國創業公司有史以來最快的。

5家電動車公司認爲他們會做得更快。

這一點上，我倒是很贊同。

https://t.co/9Ji7OF1VRh https://t.co/nBMHU6xCPK

nodes.excerpt: Ponder guides you through daily journaling right from your new tab. With self-reflective prompts, fast keyboard shortcuts, aesthetic backgrounds, and privately-stored entries, you can just focus on writing — Ponder takes care of the rest.

nodes.excerpt: If thinking about money gives you a headache, you're in the right place. Worth it is here to make it as simple as possible, simply list your assets balances (💰, 🚗, 🏠,.) and update it at your own pace. Download it for iOS and Android today!

nodes.excerpt: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.

localize.tagline: 在印度实现KYC自动化和身份验证。

localize.tagline: 在印度實現KYC自動化和身份驗證。
